body: May someone please tell me how to apply.
body_tagged: May someone please tell me how to apply.
title: How to apply to be a mod

replies.body: To the left, there is a section called "staff applications" under administration.Staff applications are currently closed, but you can always apply when they open.
replies.body_tagged: To the left, there is a section called "staff applications" under administration.Staff applications are currently closed, but you can always apply when they open.

replies.body: Veldacat, you were already informed how to do this by the same person on your alternative account, HoppyToad. Don't spam the forums when you were already given a legit answer once before. Thank you.
